title: Drawing, "Five Little Girls playing Blind Man's Bluff", 1942
medium: Pen and black ink on paper
description: White silhouettes against black background. Five little girls playing blind man's bluff, blindfolded, one facing front.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Five Little Girls playing Blind Man's Bluff", 1942.
1942. Pen and black ink on paper. Gift of Christina Malman. 1947-110-22.
